original_text: Deliver me out of the mire, and let me not sink: let me be delivered from them that hate me, and out of the deep waters.
korean_text: 나를 수렁에서 건지사 빠지지 말게 하시고 나를 미워하는 자에게서와 깊은 물에서 건지소서

sentences.original_text: Deliver me out of the mire
let me be delivered from them that hate me
and out of the deep waters
